title: Algorithms Explained

 Thatâ€™s probably a habit you picked up as a child when any size denomination of money would have been viewed as valuable and worth accumulating. 
 
 Old habits like that are hard to break, even after we become adults. Besides, itâ€™s a harmless habit. 
 
 Personally, Iâ€™ve graduated to actively looking for quarters, although I wonâ€™t pass up other coins.
